alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 4:44PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR ALL COASTAL LOCATIONS IN NORTHWEST CALIFORNIA... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR ALL COASTAL LOCATIONS IN NORTHWEST CALIFORNIA... * UPDATES...THERE HAVE BEEN NO SIGNIFICANT CHANGES SINCE THE LAST STATEMENT. * LOCAL IMPACTS...A TSUNAMI CAPABLE OF PRODUCING STRONG CURRENTS THAT MAY BE HAZARDOUS TO SWIMMERS...BOATS...AND COASTAL STRUCTURES IS OCCURRING. WIDESPREAD INUNDATION IS NOT EXPECTED. * RECOMMENDED ACTIONS...IF YOU ARE LOCATED IN THIS COASTAL AREA... MOVE OFF THE BEACH AND OUT OF HARBORS AND MARINAS. DO NOT GO TO THE COAST TO WATCH THE TSUNAMI. BE ALERT TO INSTRUCTIONS FROM YOUR LOCAL EMERGENCY OFFICIALS * FORECAST TSUNAMI START TIMES...A TSUNAMI SURGE IS ONGOING ALONG THE COAST OF NORTHERN CALIFORNIA. TSUNAMIS OFTEN ARRIVE AS A SERIES OF WAVES OR SURGES WHICH COULD BE DANGEROUS FOR MANY HOURS AFTER THE FIRST WAVE ARRIVAL. THE FIRST TSUNAMI WAVE OR SURGE MAY NOT BE THE HIGHEST IN THE SERIES. * FORECAST TSUNAMI DURATION...HAZARDOUS CURRENTS AND WAVES WILL REMAIN POSSIBLE DURING MUCH OF SATURDAY. * PRELIMINARY SOURCE INFORMATION...A VOLCANIC ERUPTION OCCURRED AT 827 PM PST ON JAN 14TH IN THE SOUTH PACIFIC OCEAN. A TSUNAMI WAS GENERATED BY THE ERUPTION. * OBSERVED TSUNAMI WAVE HEIGHTS FROM EARLIER... ARENA COVE AND CRESCENT CITY... 3.7 FEET... HUMBOLDT BAY... 0.9 FEET. * TIDE INFORMATION... HUMBOLDT BAY NORTH SPIT...LOW TIDES OF -0.2 FT AT 444 PM ON JAN 15TH AND 3.8 FT AT 409 AM ON JAN 16TH. HIGH TIDES OF 5.4 FT AT 1147 PM ON JAN 15TH AND 7.4 FT AT 1007 AM ON JAN 16TH. CRESCENT CITY HARBOR...LOW TIDES OF -0.1 FT AT 440 PM ON JAN 15TH AND 3.9 FT AT 407 AM ON JAN 16TH. HIGH TIDES OF 5.6 FT AT 1134 PM ON JAN 15TH...AND 7.4 FT AT 957 AM ON JAN 16TH. THIS PRODUCT WILL BE UPDATED AS NEW INFORMATION BECOMES AVAILABLE. STAY TUNED TO YOUR LOCAL NEWS SOURCE AND NOAA WEATHER RADIO FOR FURTHER INFORMATION AND UPDATES.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt
